import * as React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './form.css' import { Imovel } from '../types/imovel' import axios from 'axios'; import { BASE_URL } from '../utils/requests'; type Props = { imovelId : string } export default function FormCard( { imovelId } : Props){ const [imovel, setImovel] = React.useState() React.useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(`${BASE_URL}/imovel/${imovelId}`) .then(response) }) return (

{imovel.title}

) }
